articles.title: Kuda Bux: The Indian magician who charmed the West with his 'X-ray eyes' - BBC
articles.description: Kuda Bux found fame after claiming he was able to read with his face covered like an Egyptian mummy.
articles.content:
There's nothing spectacular about a man riding a bicycle through a crowded street.
But what if his eyes were covered with lumps of dough, thick swabs of cotton and several layers of gauze - and he h… [+6859 chars]

articles.title: Cher says son Chaz transitioning was "difficult for me" - NME
articles.description: Cher has reflected on her son Chaz's transition, revealing it was "difficult for me" but she later came around to accept her son.
articles.content:
Cher has reflected on her son Chaz’s transition, which she says was “difficult” for her as a parent.
